body_html:
In the first sentence, I want to say to export the model which contains featuredropout, we can only export it in train mode.

The second sentence says the exported model should not be used for the training purpose. (since theoretically people can export model in inference mode, and run it in train mode.)
body_text:
In the first sentence, I want to say to export the model which contains featuredropout, we can only export it in train mode.
The second sentence says the exported model should not be used for the training purpose. (since theoretically people can export model in inference mode, and run it in train mode.)
body:
In the first sentence, I want to say to export the model which contains featuredropout, we can only export it in train mode. 

The second sentence says the exported model should not be used for the training purpose. (since theoretically people can export model in inference mode, and run it in train mode.)
